src_original: dhyāmurttī nama stotraḥ dyārarupo (482)  mahārāve sarvaśatrū kṣayaṁkārī bhaktyā varadadevi trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||
tgt_original: ghorarūpe mahārāve sarvaśatrukṣayaṅkari |  bhaktebhyo varade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 1 ||

src_original: sarāsūrārccitadevi siddhigandharvva sāvate |  jācyapāpahanaṁdevi trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||
tgt_original: surāsurārcite devi siddhagandharvasevite |  jāḍyapāpahare devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 2 ||

src_original: sarvvamtumaṇḍalade visarvva satvahite nadye siddhānāṁ pūjitedevi trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||  dyolarūpasthitedevī sarvvā pāṇaharemtuti ugratāre namo nityaṁ trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ |
tgt_original: sarvamaṇḍala (madhyasthe)  sarvasattvahite'naghe |  siddhānāṃ pūjite devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 3 ||  ghorarūpasthite devi sarvaprāṇahare stute |  ugratāre namo nityaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 4 ||

src_original: ṇatavūddhikare devi trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||  śaktirupena momtute trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||  jotryānāma pijātryāhaṁśakti hinokvahaṁta trva |  dhira stvamevadova trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ ||  snānadāneta yājāpyavalidāne tathākrato ||
tgt_original: drutabuddhiprade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 5 ||  somarūpe koṭṭarūpe candrarūpe namo'stu te |
prasthāne ca na śakto'haṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 8 ||

src_original: śaktihīna manāthaścasarvva pāpasamanvitaṁtvāṁ vinānānyamedevi trāhimāṁ saraṇāgataṁ |
tgt_original: tvāṃ vinā na gatiryasya trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 9 ||

src_original: gandha candra madhū yeśa vande nādibhiracavā devī saṁpūjyapatnena labhate vāṁchitaṁphalaṁ |
tgt_original: gandhapuṣpādidravyaiśca vandhanādibhireva ca |  devīṃ sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam || 11 ||
aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ navamyāṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ |

src_original: padmā seḥ siddhi mānpotinā trakuryyāci cāla yeta ||

tgt_original: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
